zeta
Class WorkUnit

java.lang.Object
  zeta.WorkUnit
public abstract class WorkUnit
extends java.lang.Object

The work unit interface for the ZetaGrid framework. Do not use the extension '.$$$' for the work unit files. This extension is reserved for the temporary compression.

Field Summary

          If this work unit will be recomputed.

Method Detail

getParameters

public abstract java.lang.String getParameters()
Returns the parameters of the work unit. The parameters must be encoded in one string must be unique concatenated with other work unit parameters. The parameters should also contains the information: work unit identifier, size, recompute, and identifier of the task.

Returns:
the parameters of the work unit which are encoded in one string.
See Also:
ClientTask.createWorkUnits(String)

isCompleted

public abstract boolean isCompleted()
Checks if the work unit is completed.

Returns:
true if the work unit is completed.

containsFilenames

public abstract java.lang.String[] containsFilenames()
Returns an array with the file names of the work unit. Do not use the file extension '.$$$'

Returns:
an array with the file names of the work unit.

getLogFilename

public abstract java.lang.String getLogFilename()
Returns the logfile name of the work unit. Do not use the file extension '.$$$'

Returns:
the logfile name of the work unit.

isPartOfWorkUnit

public abstract boolean isPartOfWorkUnit(java.lang.String filename)
Checks if the specified file name is a part of ANY work unit. It must be part of ANY work unit not only of this work unit object.

Parameters:
filename - file name
Returns:
true, if the specified file name is a part of ANY work unit.

getTaskId

public int getTaskId()
Returns the identifier of the task of this work unit.

Returns:
the identifier of the task of this work unit.

public long getWorkUnitId()
Returns the identifier of this work unit.

Returns:

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns the size of this work unit.

Returns:
the size of this work unit.

isRecompute

public boolean isRecompute()
Returns if this work unit will be recomputed.

Returns:
true, if this work unit will be recomputed.

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Checks if this work unit is well defined.

Returns:
true, if this work unit is well defined.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object workUnit)
Compares this work unit to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is a work unit object that has the same identifier, size, and task identifier.

Parameters:
workUnit - the work unit to compare this WorkUnit against.
Returns:
if the WorkUnit are equal; false otherwise.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Returns a hash code for this work unit. The hash code for a work unit object is computed as 
    w/2^32 + w mod 2^32
using int arithmetic, where w is the work unit identifier ^ indicates exponentiation.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns the work unit information.

Returns:
the work unit information.
